name: Spires of the Past
description:
Team Name

Guild of Red Tea

Gameplay Instructions

Use WASD keys to move, use "F" to turn off and on flashlight, and "Shift" for dash (if there is enough mana). Collect Mana spheres to recharge you flashlight.

List any content that was created before the jam
